## **Historical Salaries** {-}

### **Workflow** {-}

Seasons -> teams -> player salaries.
Seasons url: https://www.basketball-reference.com/leagues/

```{r}
# check paths
nba_url <- "https://www.basketball-reference.com/leagues/"

paths_allowed(nba_url)
```


```{r}
# get table 

nba_data <- nba_url %>% 
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes("table") %>%
  purrr::pluck(1) %>%
  html_table() %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  filter(str_detect(x,"^20|19[8-9]")) %>%
  filter(!str_detect(x,"^2021")) %>%
  rename(season = x)

nba_href <- nba_url %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_elements("#stats > tbody > tr:nth-child(35) > th > a") %>%
  html_attr()
  
nba_data
nba_href
```
